attributes.action: remove cannabis and cannabis products from the Misuse of Drugs Act and associated laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to remove cannabis (marijuana) from prohibition laws and thus enable consumer protection.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "remove cannabis and cannabis products from the Misuse of Drugs Act and associated laws."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13948.asp

Prime Minister's Office
